name: gemini-server

tools.name: upload_file
tools.description: Upload a file to Gemini Files API for use in prompts

tools.name: generate_content
tools.description: Generate content using Gemini with optional file context

tools.name: start_chat
tools.description: Start a new chat session with Gemini and send initial message

tools.description: Send a message in an existing chat session

tools.description: List all uploaded files in the Gemini Files API with metadata

tools.name: delete_file

prompts.description: Template for analyzing uploaded media files (audio, video, image, or document)

prompts.name: document_qa
prompts.description: Template for document question-answering (summary, detailed analysis, or information extraction)

prompts.name: multimodal_analysis
prompts.description: Template for analyzing multiple files together (compare, synthesize, or create timeline)

resources.name: Chat History
